thread.title: Summer Beauty Box for only £19.99
thread.title_full: Summer Beauty Box for only £19.99 - Telegraph

author: The Telegraph
title: Summer Beauty Box for only £19.99
text: The Telegraph Summer Beauty Box offers a collection of skin care products to liven and tone your skin this summer, plus a selection of beauty treats to refresh your summer looks.The Telegraph Summer Beauty Box includes: - Cowshed Wild Body Invigorating Body Lotion-rrp. £20 - Eyeko Skinny Mascara- rrp. £15 - Ciate Nail Varnish- rrp. £9 - Fake Bake- The Face Anti-Aging Self Tanning Lotion -rrp. £22 - Bellapierre Mineral Lipstick Mandarina- rrp. £20 - Elemis Pro-Intense Daily Lotion- rrp. £22 How to claim See the newspaper on Sunday, August 23, 2015 for details of how to claim and for terms and conditions. *£4.99 postage and packaging payable. @telegraph
